description: Omescape Canada is one of the largest escape game company in Canada. Part of a global franchise, Omescape offers 60 minutes of the most advanced escape game experience in 2 convenient locations, combining dazzling details with high-tech engineering. In addition to the fun game experience, folks can sit back and enjoy over a hundred board games in house while tasting our fine selection of bubble-teas and frozen yogurt at our Markham location, or attempt Epic Runner, something entirely different and sporty over at the Scarborough location! Whether you are active or passive, Omescape Entertainment has something for everyone!

reviews.title: The Red Admiral Room
text: 5 of us did the Red Admiral Room. It was overall fun except one of the clues did not activate for us when we entered the right code. We wasted 15-20 minutes trying to figure out how to open a door when we had already figured it out by entering the code in the keypad. The keypad flashed green but nothing happened. After spending 20 minutes trying to see if there was something we missed in the other rooms, we called for a clue and they told us how to do the clue we already did (entering the code into the keypad). We entered the exact same code again and finally the door opened for us.
We explained this to the staff at the end and they sort of just be dismissed us. It definitely ruined the experience for us at the end because we would have finished the room if it wasn’t for that.

reviews.title: So much fun!
text: The room (Shut Down) was a whole lot of fun, and hints are not too obvious when asked for. A very nice experience overall, and we'll be back for more.

reviews.title: A place where you can test your brains and puzzle solving abilities
text: I went with a group of 6 who were all newbies (including myself). It was a wonderful experience. We ran out of time on the last puzzle. Literally had to close the door behind us and we would have won. The staff is great and very helpful!! Great place to spend time doing something different!!

reviews.title: Very Challenging!
text: This place was very well laid out and extremely challenging!
We did the Magic Academy and, I am not gonna lie, it beat us!  Very challenging puzzles and we were very impressed with the detail.
I would definitely come back to try another room!

reviews.title: Awesome!
text: Probably the best escape room facilities I've ever been to. The staff were friendly and helpful. The rooms (we did 2) were very creatively set up, and we're not easy!
We will definitely be returning!

reviews.title: Amazing Team Building Exercise
text: We took our work team here for team building and had SO MUCH FUN. We had a large team, so split into three groups. Every group loved the room they did (Nyctaphobia, Viral Outbreak and Defend the Magic Academy).

My team did Defend the Magic Academy and we loved every second. We are all huge Harry Potter fans (we even showed up with wands) and loved the way the room made us feel like we were students at Hogwarts.  The rooms were well planned out and challenging (some were extremely challenging and we had a moment we were sure we wouldn't escape). We got out with two minutes to spare! Highly recommend this place. The rooms are super detailed and well thought out and challenging.

reviews.title: One of the best escape rooms
text: In addition to the Markham location of Omescape, they have a second location in Scarborough as well!  This location is situated on Kennedy Road north of Lawrence Avenue East.
Similar to the Markham location, they have a range of multi-difficulty level multi-room escape games and include high-tech components.
Each room is themed differently with a different plot.  We played the one-hour “Virus Outbreak” designed for 3 to 8 players.  We had 4 players in our team.
We were definitely stumped with the puzzles in this room but had such a blast trying to decipher the clues.  There were so many authentic-looking and high-tech components!  I loved it.

I really appreciated how the staff gave us some extra time at the end of the game even though our 60 minutes were already up.  It wasn’t until we asked for a clue that one of the staff members finally came to get us.  She walked us through the remainder of the game and how to escape the last part (turns out we were only 60% done!).  The “Virus Outbreak” room was so thorough and well-designed.
Before we left, we took a group photo in front of the chalkboard mural with props.
I’m so glad we got to come here to play a game!  They also have an “Epic Runner” obstacle style course as well!
Their online booking form is easy to use (they require a $25 deposit that is used towards your payment to secure the booking) and their staff is quick in responding to inquiries.

Upon arrival, if you check in on social media (Facebook or Instagram, etc.), you can receive a $3 off per person.  They have a coat rack and free lockers for you to store your belongings while you play.  The staff was really friendly!

reviews.title: Amazing rooms!
text: If you are looking for top quality escape rooms this is your place! The rooms are fun and have lots of high quality puzzles. I highly recommend this place. We have done almost all the rooms here now and loved all of them as they are all different in their own way. Staff are friendly, easy parking and you can play board games while you wait.

reviews.title: Great First Experience
text: Went to Omescape with a couple friends not knowing what to expect. None of us had been t an escape room before.
When we arrived we were promptly checked in and taken to a briefing room where we were given the rules of the game.
I don’t want to spoil the adventure by telling what’s next however it is a lot of fun and I highly recommend going. You won’t be disappointed.

reviews.title: Magic Academy
text: One of the longer rooms at 90mins, it did not disappoint.  Impressed with the level of detail in the design and decor, would highly recommend!

reviews.title: Amazing time!!
text: Definitely bringing all my friends here for the Epic Runner. I havent enjoyed sweating as much as I did here. It was well planned out, well run and a fantastic time. I can't wait to come back!!

reviews.title: Epic Runner
text: Lots of fun with a big group. Intense cardio and physical. Will recommended if you are up for physical fun.

reviews.title: Virus room was excellent, only a couple of tiny issues
text: On the whole, we thoroughly enjoyed this room.  We have done many rooms and were a team of 4 doing this 4/5 difficulty room; we made it to the very last puzzle and had it solved but it was a tiny bit of a stretch and a bit unfair.  There was also a colour issue earlier which was unfair and required us to burn a clue for no reason (host stated it has been an issue with other teams...why not fix the thing if multiple people have had issues with it?).  I don't want to reveal too much about those but these are small issues in an otherwise amazing room.
The theme was excellent, the props were all high quality and made sense in the scene, the puzzles were fun and varied.

Oh, one more thing, we were booked to a late one and when we got there we were informed the group before us was 30 minutes late so we'd be pushed way back.  This is pretty unacceptable, I'm not sure what the right way to deal with this is as a business where promptness is required, but it sure sucked to be that team that had to wait because someone else couldn't show up on time.  We weren't offered another room as an alternative or any discount, etc, just a sorry.  I hope that's a rare event as the rest of this place is excellent and I think it's 5/5 stars.

reviews.title: BEST INDOOR ACTIVITY AROUND
text: My group did the Epic Runner, the facility was clean, filled with interesting obstacles and the maze was well organized. The staff ensured we were safe and having fun at all times. They were so helpful and made the experience the best ever, they helped take our picture and the games were high in fun and interesting. The ninety minutes were amazing and flew by! I would recommend this for a team building exercise or a fun night with friends. WILL BE GOING BACK!!

reviews.title: Amazing for Teambuilding & Family Reunions
text: We come here annually with my cousins (10 of us). It's amazing and I would highly recommend it for parties and reunions!

reviews.title: Best escape game in GTA
text: Omescape never failed us.
After visiting their Markham store, we continued our adventure to their 2nd store in Scarborough.
Virus Outbreak - absolutely amazing and there're several Surprise~~ moments in this game. Besides, they use real water! The ending is my favorite part and my heart beats so fast.

Red Admiral - Within the 10+ games we played in Toronto, we laugh the most in this game. I don't want to spoil anything but there's some SUPER COOL parts in this game that you don't want to miss. A thrilling, immersive, fun escape game! Definitely my favorite one in Toronto!

Epic Runner - Not an escape game but so eager to try it, unfortunate we only have 5 people. It's a brilliant idea and I can definitely see how our group will enjoy it. I will try my best to find enough players to play.

reviews.title: Fun for all!
text: If you're a fan of the tv series, they give you a great venue and host to play the game. Friendly staff and lots of space to play running man!

reviews.title: Wear comfortable clothes
text: A lot of fun. Wear really comfortable clothes. I’m pretty sweaty and would like a beverage (which they also sell for a dollar twenty five)

reviews.title: Ivory and Lee's bday extravaganza
text: Great times! The staff was amazing and the game hosts were hilarious.  Would def come back!
It is a workout for sure but both the mind and the body!

reviews.title: birthday fun
text: came here with friends for my wife and my birthday. had such a great games. The host and staff were so friendly.  if you havent tries epicrunner get on it.

reviews.title: EPIC birthday at EPIC runner!!!
text: Took a team of people here for mine and my husband’s 33rd birthday and we had a BLAST!!!!! Innovative games, amazing facility and INCREDIBLE facilitators-literally the COOLEST bday in YEARS!!!

reviews.title: Omescape was amazing
text: Went with a group of 10. Did all of their escape rooms. Best rooms I've done over 20 escape rooms best company by far.

reviews.title: Great room escape!
text: My friends and I have done all 4 of the escape rooms available and they were all really great! Especially the newest room "Defend the Magic Academy"

reviews.title: Epic run
text: The staffs were very friendly. We had a lot of fun. The games were awesome! Great bonding experience with friends.

reviews.title: Epic runnnn
text: Very friendly staff. Fun games. Epic run was a good cardio session, great for ppl of all ages. Recommend wearing long sleeves and pants so you don't hurt ur knees and elbows. They do provide protective equipment.

reviews.title: Most fun EVER!!!!
text: Multiple layers of difficulty , increasingly more fun. Friendships made and strengthened.  Thank you omescape

reviews.title: Epic Runner was the BOMB!
text: I came here with a group of 11 friends and we did Epic Runner and it kicked my out of shape butt! The games were well organized and run efficiently. We had a lot of fun and will definitely be back if I get the chance! 10/10 would recommend! You'll have a great time!

reviews.title: VIRUS Room was good. One glitch though
text: This was the first time that we went to a (any) Escape Room game and we had fun.  We did not have a booking yet the staff was able to accommodate us. They were very nice about it also and made us feel welcome. Our party of 5, all first timers, included 3 teenagers, and they had fun as well.

The "adventure" starts with a quick 2-3 min video going over some commonsense, yet useful info. We are then led, to the escape room. We did the virus escape room, which is rated as the highest in difficulty level. I will suggest starting with an easier one.

We were at a loss when we were in the first room. But we eventually made our way through. The game is to solve puzzles based on different clues which are available. As each puzzle gets solved, you advance to the next level and so forth. There is a 60 min time limit for the game that we played. These limits are known upfront and listed on the company's website. I dont want to give away too much as it will spoil the fun.
After our time ran out, the staff gave us 5 extra mins. They also offered to take our photo.

The reason for 4 star is that there was couple of glitches. The major glitch was that the color coding for one of the puzzle was messed up. Instead of orange, it should have been red. This prevented us from solving that specific puzzle. The other one was minor when a door should have opened itself but didnt. We didnt lose much time as one of the staffer came over right  away to open the door.
All in all, it was fun and yes we will go again

reviews.title: Lots of fun!!
text: This was a great experience. You get to play all sorts of games within a maze. Some are strategy and some are like tag. It is super fun and something different to do. It's like laser tag vs gym class.

reviews.title: Great for a group!
text: 6 of us wanted a night out.  This Escape Room provided a challenging and fun time together.  Loved the one room we did...will be back for the others!!

reviews.title: Love it
text: Awesome place to hang out with friends. 10/10. Will definitely come again. Perfect for any events!!!

reviews.title: Amazingly fun!
text: When my daughter suggested we try an Escape Room, I thought "why not?".  It turned out to be an incredibly fun night with my two teens.  Working together,using our brains and different perspectives to figure things out was so freaking much fun!  We would do it again in a heartbeat, and are actually planning our next outing here at Omescape Scarborough.  Staff were cheery, informative, and very helpful (when needed,of course lol).  They definitely prepped us for an adventure.  I would recommend this particular place to anyone looking for a fun night.

reviews.title: Epic Runner!
text: Our bridal party went to Omescape Scarborough for Epic Runner as a private group of 13, and everyone had a blast! It had its intense moments in terms of exertion, but it's not like only the physically fit can play (some obstacles would require a little bit of dexterity to navigate, but you can take the long route to go around it as well). Wayne did a great job picking and choosing game modes to balance exertion and strategy. My personal favorite mode was Bang! - it took a while to get through the rules and instructions, but if you're into deception-type games this one's great. Definitely looking forward to be back to try their nerf gun mode!

reviews.title: EPIC RUNNER
text: Very thrilling games for large groups of people! With a mixture of puzzles, obstacles and the right ambience, my heart was left pounding from the running as well as fear. 10/10 would come again!

reviews.title: EPIC RUNNER
text: Best place if you want to run around with your friends and get competitive! Intense games with a big maze to explore. The challenges keep you guessing and are so much fun!! 11/10 would recommend!

reviews.title: Epic Runner
text: The mini games were so fun and a good way to exercise with friends!!! All of the stafff were really friendly too!! I would definitely recommend this to anybody!

reviews.title: Oh man, so amazing
text: Holy moly was it the best. The maze is amazing, I would do it again and again. Great stuff, its so cool.
